summary: Three teenage girls create their own rite of passage into adulthood, forcing one another to face sexual challenges and cross many boundaries.
cast: Emma Leth|Cathrine Bjørn|Amalie Lindegård|Sebastian Jessen|Charlotte Sieling|Lars Brygmann|Cyron Melville|Niklas Lundstrøm|Amalie Rendtorff-Smith|Karen-Lise Mynster|Nikolaj Coster-Waldau|Simone Bendix|Søren Bregendal|Julie Christiansen|Steen Stig Lommer|Molly Blixt Egelind|Mads Knarreborg|Eva Rosenberg|Sofie Gelvan|Christina Jensen|Pernille Rosendahl|Karen Rosenberg|Nicklas Søderberg Lundstrøm|David Petersen|Mette Stender
keywords: rite of passage|teenage girl|friendship between teens|lesbian kiss|friendship between girls
title: Supervoksen
